1.content:
<Naruto POV>

It was a nice sunny cloudy day in Konoha and despite that, I am still getting used to my 'new' current life, despite how unsettling it is. I cannot help but remember that fateful day, where two weeks ago I used an incantation in a book that I found during a mission outside of Konoha that cause everything to be changed. The book disappeared after that and I cannot help but regret that I used it one.....
1.title: A Changed New Life

info.brief_description: What would Naruto do if his life changed in a way he could never imagine, permanently.....
info.description:
Inspired and based "A Life changed forever" by Stonefort28, where the main character is Naruto (Crossover characters may be allowed)

You add chapters but the rules below must be followed.

Rules:
You can use Naruto and any female character to swap/or give Naruto a copy of the body (Be it exactly or with some difference), be it a character that is already dead or still alive (If the character was originally dead, you can make whatever excuse, that is reasonable in Naruto world, to fulfill the reason why they are alive). The timeline is mostly starts after the timeskip (when Shippuuden starts) or the latest after the Fourth Shinobi War.

Crossover characters might be allowed but their history must be changed to be into the Naruto world.

Incest and Yuri (FemalexFemale) is allowed. No Yaoi (Unless one sided from the other person). Naruto despite the changes to his body, is considered a male in a pairing.

It is preferable that Naruto and the female selected does not switch lives (Although you are allowed to do so if you have an option to choose between keeping his own life or changing to the females life)

Also, the story concentrates more about after the event and the physical and emotional challenges that Naruto has to deal with. Also note, that the change is permanent, history will be changed to reflect the swap and Naruto is the only one that notices the changes and remembers both the history before and after the swap.
